synopsis.text: Nie Li finds himself unexpectedly given a second chance at life after dying in battle against powerful demons. He awakens back in his 13-year-old self's body, armed with extensive knowledge and cultivation from his prior life. Though initially weak, Nie Li is determined to quickly regain his strength and stand at the pinnacle of the martial world once more. This time, Nie Li aims to protect his loved ones and city by preventing the same devastation brought by demon beasts that led to his first demise. He also intends to rebuild his relationships and help his friends cultivate so they avoid their previous fates. Additionally, Nie Li harbors vengeance against the Sacred family for betraying the city and leaving it vulnerable to attack. With monumental determination and his foreknowledge, Nie Li begins his quest to alter his own destiny and the destinies of those close to him. He confronts long-standing enemies from his past, plots the downfall of the traitorous Sacred family, and sets out to become an unrivaled martial expert in this new lifetime. Through it all, Nie Li pursues the strength to defend his city and change the course of history.
